author: Shannon Becker
title: EF-1 Tornado strikes near Aurora, timeline of events | Joplin News First | koamnewsnow.com
text: LAWRENCE COUNTY, Mo. (KOAM) — The National Weather Service alerted Wednesday, “4:40PM: Likely tornado ongoing near/just south of Highway 60 in southern Lawrence County near Aurora. Take cover now!” [] EF-1 Tornado strikes near Aurora, timeline of events Aurora Rural Fire: “Minor injuries and no patients transported to the hospital.” [Shannon Becker](https://www.koamnewsnow.com/users/profile/Shannon%20Becker) - - Updated Most Popular - [School bus rear-ended by tractor-trailer, bus spun around 180°, slamming into rock bluff](/news/joplin-news-first/school-bus-rear-ended-by-tractor-trailer-bus-spun-around-180-slamming-into-rock-bluff/article_538fbb38-0e16-11ef-9c69-e3bca1ac7b2b.html) - [Storm damage in Monett area; Tornado confirmed as EF-1](/news/joplin-news-first/storm-damage-in-monett-area-tornado-confirmed-as-ef-1/article_5faa3264-0d98-11ef-87c6-6b657e76db93.html) - [Fatal head-on crash on River Street in Carthage](/news/auto-accident/fatal-head-on-crash-on-river-street-in-carthage/article_c66e1e4c-0ce0-11ef-98dd-670f02e7217f.html) - [EF-1 Tornado strikes near Aurora, timeline of events](/news/joplin-news-first/ef-1-tornado-strikes-near-aurora-timeline-of-events/article_5fc618f8-0e1a-11ef-8fc4-332162d6f816.html) - [Pickup flips in crash near Jasper just as storms ramp up](/news/joplin-news-first/pickup-flips-in-crash-near-jasper-just-as-storms-ramp-up/article_89abf38e-0df9-11ef-b96f-7322b1ae7ae9.html)
